Package cli

Interface JobTrackable

All Known Implementing Classes:
Renderer
public interface JobTrackable
Classes which inherit this interface provide a way for registered JobTrackers to track the progress of a large task this object is doing which consists of many small jobs.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    default void completeOneJob()
    Let all registered trackers know that one more job has been completed.
    default void finished()
    Let all registered trackers know that the task has been completed.
    java.util.List<JobTracker> jobTrackers()
    Get a list of all registered JobTrackers.
    default void register​(JobTracker jobTracker)
    Register a JobTracker to track the progress of this object.
    int totalJobs()
    Get the total number of jobs to be performed.

  • Method Details

    • totalJobs

      int totalJobs()
      Get the total number of jobs to be performed.
      Returns:
      The total number of jobs to be performed.

    • register

      default void register​(JobTracker jobTracker)
      Register a JobTracker to track the progress of this object.
      Parameters:
      jobTracker - The job tracker to track the progress of this object.

    • finished

      default void finished()
      Let all registered trackers know that the task has been completed.

    • completeOneJob

      default void completeOneJob()
      Let all registered trackers know that one more job has been completed.

    • jobTrackers

      java.util.List<JobTracker> jobTrackers()
      Get a list of all registered JobTrackers.
      Returns:
      A list of all registered JobTrackers.
